languages.text: "Да обрушим мы гнев Его на врагов наших, да будет воздаяние неотвратимым, а кара — суровой".

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Ой йой, что же делается! На нас напали!

languages.text: "Let us bring His wrath down upon our foes! May their retribution be inescapable and their punishment severe."
languages.original_text: "Да обрушим мы гнев Его на врагов наших, да будет воздаяние неотвратимым, а кара — суровой".

traits.locale_text: "Let us bring His wrath down upon our foes! May retribution be inescapable and the punishment severe."
"Let us bring His wrath down upon our foes! May retribution be inescapable and the punishment severe."
"Let us bring His wrath down upon our foes! May their retribution be inescapable and their punishment severe."
"Let us bring His wrath down upon our foes! May their retribution be inescapable and their punishment severe."
"Let us bring His wrath down upon our foes! May their retribution be inescapable and their punishment severe."

languages.text: «¡Hagamos caer Su cólera sobre nuestros enemigos! Que su castigo sea tan ineludible como severo».
languages.original_text: "Let us bring His wrath down upon our foes! May their retribution be inescapable and their punishment severe."

traits.locale_text: «¡Hagamos caer Su cólera sobre nuestros enemigos! Que su castigo sea tan ineludible como severo».

languages.text: 「敵に主の怒りを下そう！彼らの報復が逃れられず、厳しい罰となりますように」
languages.original_text: "Let us bring His wrath down upon our foes! May their retribution be inescapable and their punishment severe."

traits.locale_text: 「敵に主の怒りを下そう！彼らの報復が逃れられず、厳しい罰となりますように」

languages.text: “我们要在敌人头上降下祂的怒火！愿敌人的报应逃无可逃，愿他们的惩罚严厉无比。”
languages.original_text: "Let us bring His wrath down upon our foes! May their retribution be inescapable and their punishment severe."

traits.locale_text: “我们要在敌人头上降下祂的怒火！愿敌人的报应逃无可逃，愿他们的惩罚严厉无比。”

languages.text: "Bringen wir Seinen Zorn über unsere Gegner! Möge ihre Vergeltung unausweichlich und ihre Strafe schwer sein."
languages.original_text: "Let us bring His wrath down upon our foes! May their retribution be inescapable and their punishment severe."

traits.locale_text: "Bringen wir Seinen Zorn über unsere Gegner! Möge ihre Vergeltung unausweichlich und ihre Strafe schwer sein."

languages.text: « Que Sa sainte colère s'abatte sur nos adversaires ! Puisse Sa vengeance être implacable et leur châtiment exemplaire. »
languages.original_text: "Let us bring His wrath down upon our foes! May their retribution be inescapable and their punishment severe."

traits.locale_text: « Que Sa sainte colère s'abatte sur nos adversaires ! Puisse Sa vengeance être implacable et leur châtiment exemplaire. »
